Package org.hlacerti.lib

Cosimulation between HLA/CERTI and Ptolemy II.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutomaticSimulation
    Implement an automatic simulation of any model chosen by the user.
    CertiRtig
    Execute the HLA/CERTI RTIG in a subprocess.
    HlaManager
    The Ptolemy-HLA co-simulation framework leverages two open source tools: Ptolemy II and HLA/CERTI.
    HlaPublisher
    This actor provides the name of the class C, the name of the attribute attr and the name of the instance i (C.attr.i) that are used by the HlaManager attribute (deployed in the same model) with two goals: - During initialization phase, the HlaManager calls the HLA services for publishing all the attributes attrC and registering an instance i of a class for this federate: rtia.publishObjectClass(classHandle, _attributesLocal) and rtia.registerObjectInstance(classHandle, classInstanceName).
    HlaReporter
    This class implements a HLA Reporter which collects and writes several statistics to analyze the correct usage of HLA services.
    HlaSubscriber
    This actor implements a subscriber in a HLA/CERTI federation.
    HlaTimedEvent
    This class extends the TimedEvent class to add specific information relative to HLA "events" received from HLA/CERTI.
    MessageProcessing
    This class implements the functionalities to encode/decode HLA values received from HLA/CERTI.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HlaManager.ETimeManagementService
    Enumeration which represents both time advancement services NER or TAR.

Package org.hlacerti.lib Description

Cosimulation between HLA/CERTI and Ptolemy II.

Since:
Ptolemy II 8.1
